summary: The title is pretty self explanatory.  I tried to give a natural feeling to the breast. Works with body mesh like BBP. Includes a 360 version.
descriptionHtml:
VIDEO :
http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xz4qng_skyrim-breast-animation_videogames#.UXJLmIaG7NI


These animation will replace the vanilla walk, run, sprint and Idle animation (unarmed). Note that the breasts in the Idle are static, I just modified the file a bit to blend well with the walk and the run. It will also apply to all female NPCs.

Installation : just copy the data folder in your skyrim folder. It will add (or overwrite) any animation related with the unarmed walk, run, sprint and Idle. This mod is obviously incompatible with all other mod that modifies the same animation files. You must have a Body mesh that supports breast animation, like CHSBHC. You can find some of those mesh here :

   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888
   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899

You can also search for \"BBP\" to find armors, clothings and bodies compatible with this mod.

Known issues : Camera flips from time to time, if you sprint it should fix it.

Hope you like it. Cheers!

Update : Fixed the sound problem. Now you should hear the footsteps while walking and running.
author: DarkAngel1265
